name: Who's Who in "Grandia 3" Quiz | Video Games | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these does the main character, Yuki, want to be?
questions.explanation:
Pilot.

	Yuki has built and crashed at least eighteen planes before the video game begins, but he is stubborn! He wields a sword, and learns many wind-based techniques.

questions.text: What's the name of Yuki's young mother?
questions.explanation:
Miranda.

	Miranda wants her son to become a potter, not a pilot. She accompanies him for part of his journey to Acriff and uses two deadly daggers to fight enemies.

Schmidt.

	Schmidt is a famous airplane pilot, akin to Charles Lindbergh. He later makes a plane for Yuki after Yuki brings him some Lem fruit.

questions.text: Which loud, obnoxious woman once planned to marry Alonso?
questions.explanation:
Bianca.

	Bianca ran a casino that pandered to Alonso's gambling addiction. Alonso wagered his life on one last bet and, with some outside intervention, won. This drove Bianca out of town.

questions.text: What is the last name of Alfina, the mild-mannered girl who is slated to become a Communicator?
questions.explanation:
de Pamela.

	Alfina wields her spell-casting staff in battle. She is able to call on powerful monsters to help the party, and is searching for her lost brother.

questions.text: Who was Yuki's friend back in Anfog?
questions.explanation:
Rotts.

	Rotts helps Yuki build his numerous planes, and is more attentive to detail than Yuki is. He is a non-playable character, and remains in Anfog for much of the game.

questions.text: Alfina remarks that one character's hands are very cold. Which character is she referring to?
questions.explanation:
Hect.

	Hecht spends her time severing the ties between the world our heroes inhabit and the Verse realm. Accomplishing this by playing a melancholy song on her violin, she is originally introduced in the Verse realm.

questions.text: Which character regularly rides a dragon and joins your party?
questions.explanation:
Ulf.

	Ulf lives in the Valley of Dragons, and enjoys good food. His dragon is named Shiba, and originally won't let Yuki ride him. Ulf has a tail, setting him apart from the rest of the group.

questions.text: Dahna is searching for her missing lover, Raven.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Dahna's weapon of choice are cards, which are either thrown or used to cast powerful magic spells. She is outwardly cynical and disimissive of the concept of love.

questions.text: What is the name of Alfina's brother?
questions.explanation:
Emelious.

	Emelious is first seen riding a large, airborne snake. He was slated to be the next Communicator, but became disgruntled and ran away. Alfina has been looking for him since then.
